vlive.korean: 나 너네 합류해도 돼? Can I join you? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 취향대로 고른 1:1 데이트! 우리 정말 잘 어울릴까?ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP6
과연 누가 그룹 TOO에 합류할 수 있게 될까요? Who will join TOO? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [최종회] '꿈에 그리던 데뷔!' 생방송 심사 결과 1위 멤버
태형이가 낚시 크루 합류하기로 했어요 기대해주세요 - 저 요즘 좀 낚시 한번 가보는... Taehyung promised to join our fishing crew. Look forward to it. - I want to go fishing lately... 듣기 View video BTS : 아미와 함께 해피뉴이어!
vlive.english: Taehyung promised to join our fishing crew. Look forward to it. - I want to go fishing lately...

vlive.korean: [합류] 조용히 좀... Please be quiet. 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 행복한 연습실
노랑지에 합류해달라고? Be part of Yellows? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 지쎈왔다🐳

examples.korean: She beckoned him to come and join them. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그에게 와서 그들과 합류하라고 손짓을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She beckoned him to come and join them. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll be along in a few minutes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 몇 분 후에 합류할게. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll be along in a few minutes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He crossed over the road and joined me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 도로를 건너와 나와 합류했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He crossed over the road and joined me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We sent a wire asking him to join us. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그에게 우리와 합류하라고 청하는 전신을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We sent a wire asking him to join us. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve joined the ranks of the unemployed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 실업자 대열에 합류했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve joined the ranks of the unemployed. Add to Wordbook
